title: France panorama. [No. 72/43]
creator_credit: Societe d'informations Cinematographiques and Gaumont-British Instructional
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Trailer-lovers - the Bourget International Caravaning Salon; Office equipment - data-processing and communications salon; For sportsmen - the 24-hour Mans motorcycle race. 2. Chagall - the master’s most recent works. 3. A balance-sheet on cancer: Professor Mathe - at the Villejuif Research Institute. 4. Music in the Loire Valley - Chambord Music Festival.
